colorPalette

类 OctTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • colorPalette.OctTree
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ColorExtractor

    public class OctTree
extends java.lang.Object
implements ColorExtractor
    Use an Octree to extract main colors. See the links below.
    用八叉树提取主要颜色，参见下面的链接
    https://xcoder.in/2014/09/17/theme-color-extract/
    https://www.microsoft.com/msj/archive/S3F1.aspx
    This file is translated from JS and C++ at this repo:
    这个文件是从下面这个仓库的JS和C++文件改写成java的
    https://github.com/XadillaX/theme-color-test

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      OctTree()
      initialize the seven elements in this.reducible as null
      把 this.reducible中的七个元素初始化为null

      准备好做下一次提取

      进行八叉树运算并和已有色板比较
      int[][] getRGBPalette(java.awt.image.BufferedImage img, int maxColors)
      if maxColors is less than the number of nodes in the first layer, IndexOutOfBound will be thrown. so we force it to be more than 12, than we will truncate or fill the return array so it has the same number of colors.

        public OctTree()

    • 方法详细资料

      • getRGBPalette

        public int[][] getRGBPalette(java.awt.image.BufferedImage img,
                             int maxColors)
        if maxColors is less than the number of nodes in the first layer, IndexOutOfBound will be thrown. so we force it to be more than 12, than we will truncate or fill the return array so it has the same number of colors.
        如果需要的颜色小于第一层节点数（8）会报错，所以强制设为12以上。 返回前截取需要个数的颜色，如果没有足够颜色数组用{-1, -1, -1}填充
        指定者:
        getRGBPalette 在接口中 ColorExtractor
        参数:
        img -
        maxColors -
        the number of output colors. if not enough colors are extracted, the rgb array will be filled with {-1, -1, -1}
        返回的颜色个数，如果没有足够颜色数组用{-1, -1, -1}填充
        返回:
        int[maxColors][3]

      • getPaletteAccordingTo

        public int[][] getPaletteAccordingTo(java.lang.String palette,
                                     java.awt.image.BufferedImage img,
                                     int maxColors)
        perform the oct-tree algorithm and compared it with a palette
        进行八叉树运算并和已有色板比较
        参数:
        palette - path to the palette file, a reader will be constructed to read it 色板文件的路径，一个reader会构建来读它
        img -
        maxColors -
        the number of output colors. if not enough colors are extracted, the rgb array will be filled with {-1, -1, -1}
        返回的颜色个数，如果没有足够颜色数组用{-1, -1, -1}填充
        返回:
        int[maxColors][3]

      • getPaletteAccordingTo

        public int[][] getPaletteAccordingTo(java.util.ArrayList<int[]> colors,
                                     java.awt.image.BufferedImage img,
                                     int maxColors)
        perform the oct-tree algorithm and compared it with a palette
        进行八叉树运算并和已有色板比较
        参数:
        colors - rgb[] listrgb[] 颜色列表
        img -
        maxColors -
        the number of output colors. if not enough colors are extracted, the rgb array will be filled with {-1, -1, -1}
        返回的颜色个数，如果没有足够颜色数组用{-1, -1, -1}填充
        返回:
        array of colors, in rgb arrays

      • getFirstKeyByValue

        public static <T,E> T getFirstKeyByValue(java.util.Map<T,E> map,
                                         E value)
        Find the first key in a map with the given value and remove the entry
        找到map中第一个有给定值的key，然后删除这个键值对
        参数:
        map -
        value - 给定的值
        返回:
        the key removed被删除的key
